–ù–æ–≤—ã–π –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º PaLm-SayCan –æ–±—ä–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è–µ—Ç —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –ò–ò-–º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ —Å –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–∞–º–∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ–≤. –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –¥–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç—É, —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–µ–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç –µ–≥–æ –≤ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —à–∞–≥–æ–≤ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–æ–≤ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∞, –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—è –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏–º—ã–π –ø–ª–∞–Ω —Å —É—á–µ—Ç–æ–º —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∞ –∏ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–∞—é—â–µ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã. –†–æ–±–æ—Ç —Å–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É —Å–æ —Å–≤–æ–∏–º –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—è–º–∏, —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –µ–µ –Ω–∞ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –º–µ–ª–∫–∏–µ —à–∞–≥–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–µ—Ç –∫ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é. –≠—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è ‚Äî –±–µ–∑ —Å–æ–º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–æ –∫–∞–∫ –≤ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–æ–±—â–µ –≤ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫ ‚Äî –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–∞.

11 –∞–≤–≥—É—Å—Ç–∞ 2022 18:00-20:30 (–≤—Ä–µ–º—è –ú–æ—Å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–æ–µ)

–ü–æ—Ö–æ–∂–µ, —á—Ç–æ —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º—ã–º –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–º –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–º –ò–ò –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–µ–≥–æ –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–≥–æ. –í –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º—É, —á—Ç–æ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –¥–≤—É–º—è –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞–º–∏-–ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ò–ò ‚Äî –°–®–ê –∏ –ö–∏—Ç–∞–µ–º -–∏–º–µ—é—Ç—Å—è –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ—Ä–µ—á–∏—è, –æ–±—É—Å–ª–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π:

‚Ä¢  –î–ª—è –°–®–ê ‚Äì —ç—Ç–æ –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç—Å–∫–∞—è —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞—è —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∞, –¥–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∞—è –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç –Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞—Ö –ª–∏—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º—É –≤—Å—è—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤—è—â–∞—è—Å—è –ª—é–±—ã–º –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –ò–ò, –≥—Ä–æ–∑—è—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞—Ä—É—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –ø—Ä–∞–≤ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–º—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü –µ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

‚Ä¢  –ê –¥–ª—è –ö–∏—Ç–∞—è ‚Äì —ç—Ç–æ –ª–µ–∂–∞—â–∞—è –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ö–∏—Ç–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ—É—Ü–∏–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∞, –¥–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∞—è –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç –Ω–µ –Ω–∞ –ª–∏—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –∞ –Ω–∞ –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ, –∏ –≤ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–µ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è —Å–º–∏—Ä–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å –Ω–∞—Ä—É—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –ø—Ä–∞–≤ –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ª—é–¥–µ–π, –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ–º—ã—Ö –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É.

–°—Ç–æ–ª—å —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ —ç—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –°–®–ê –∏ –ö–∏—Ç–∞—è –≤–µ–¥—É—Ç –∫ –≤–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–º –≤–∏–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è–º ‚ÄúGood AI Society‚Äù:

‚Ä¢  –ö–∏—Ç–∞–π—Å–∫–æ–µ –≤–∏–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ ‚Äì —ç—Ç–æ –≥–∞—Ä–º–æ–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ò–ò –≤ —Ü–µ–ª—è—Ö —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–∞—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã.

‚Ä¢  –í–∏–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∂–µ –°–®–ê –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–∏–µ–º–ª–µ–º—ã–º –¥–ª—è –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –ò–ò-—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–∞—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–∞, –¥–∞–∂–µ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —ç—Ç–æ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä. —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤).

–ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ª–∏ AGI –Ω–∞—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —ç—Ç–∏–∫—É –µ–≥–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π? –ö–∞–∫–∞—è —ç—Ç–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∞? –ù–∞—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤–æ–æ–±—â–µ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç —ç—Ç–∏–∫—É –ò–ò? 

–ú–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ª–∏ –∑–∞–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å —ç—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –Ω–æ—Ä–º—ã –≤ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –ò–ò? –ê –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ª–∏ –µ—â–µ –∏ –≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, —á—Ç–æ –æ–Ω –∏—Ö –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—Ç—å? –ò–ª–∏ –∫–∞–∫ —Å —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–æ–º - –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—É—á–∏—Ç—å –∞ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º –Ω–∞–¥–µ—è—Ç—å—Å—è?)))

–ü–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏–º –æ–± —ç—Ç–æ–º: 
- —Å –°–µ—Ä–≥–µ–µ–º –ö–∞—Ä–µ–ª–æ–≤—ã–º, –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–µ–π—à–∏–º –Ω–µ–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º—ã–º IT-—ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–º, –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–ª–æ–≥–∞ ‚Äú–ú–∞–ª–æ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ–µ‚Äù, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ –≤—ã—Å–≤–µ—Ç–∏–ª —ç—Ç—É –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—É
- —Å –ö–æ–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–Ω–æ–º –í–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—Ü–æ–≤—ã–º, –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ NLP –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏

message : –°–∏–º–≤–æ–ª—ã –∏ –º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã: –≥–∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ–∑–∞ –æ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏

–î–ª—è —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ –±—ã –æ–±—ä—è—Å–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –ø–∞–º—è—Ç—å —É –ª—é–¥–µ–π, —É—á—ë–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—É–ª–∏—Ä—É—é—Ç –º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —è–∑—ã–∫, —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≥–æ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

–ï—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —è–∑—ã–∫ —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –µ–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä, –æ–±—ä—è—Å–Ω—è—é—â–∏–π –∫–æ–≥–Ω–∏—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—É—é –Ω–µ–æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –≤–∏–¥–∞. –í–º–µ—Å—Ç–æ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä—ã —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ–ª–∞–≥–∞—é—Ç, —á—Ç–æ –ª—é–¥–∏ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞—é—Ç –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–∏–º–∏ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–º–∏ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞–º–∏ –º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è.

–ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤—å—Ç–µ —Å–µ–±–µ –∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä - —è–¥—Ä–æ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –∞—Å—Å–µ–º–±–ª–µ—Ä–µ, –≤–∞—à –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã–π –±—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä –Ω–∞ –°, –∞ –±–ª–æ–≥, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –≤—ã —á–∏—Ç–∞–µ—Ç–µ –∑–∞ –æ–±–µ–¥–æ–º –Ω–∞ JS. 

–ü–æ—Ö–æ–∂–∏–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–º –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–π –Ω–∞—à –º–æ–∑–≥ –ø—Ä–∏–¥—É–º–∞–ª —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–∏. –≠—Ç–∏ —è–∑—ã–∫–∏ –æ–ø–∏—Ä–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ —Å—Ö–µ–º—ã, –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π. 

–ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –∏–∑ —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è: 

(i) –¥–∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª–æ–≤, –∏ (ii) –∏—Ö —Ä–µ–∫—É—Ä—Å–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–µ–π –≤ –º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã.

message : #–∏–∏

–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–ª–∏ –º–æ—Å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∏–º –≤—Ä–∞—á–∞–º –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 6,5 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–∞ –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–æ–≤

–í –º–æ—Å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø–æ–ª–∏–∫–ª–∏–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ö —Å 2020 –≥–æ–¥–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è –≤—Ä–∞—á–µ–±–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π (–°–ü–ü–í–†). –ó–∞ —ç—Ç–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥ –≤—Ä–∞—á–∞–º-—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–ø–µ–≤—Ç–∞–º –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 6,5 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–≤–∞—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–æ–≤, –ø—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ–ª–æ–≤–∏–Ω—ã ‚Äî —Å –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞.

–ú–æ–¥—É–ª—å –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–≤–∞—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–∞ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –∂–∞–ª–æ–±—ã –ø–∞—Ü–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –≤—Ä–∞—á –≤–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç –≤ –µ–¥–∏–Ω—É—é –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫—É—é –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ-–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É (–ï–ú–ò–ê–°) –≤ —Ö–æ–¥–µ –ø—Ä–∏–µ–º–∞, –∞ –∑–∞—Ç–µ–º –Ω–∞ –∏—Ö –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å –æ–¥–∏–Ω –∏–∑ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ö –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–æ–≤, –ø—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –Ω–µ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–∏–≤–∞—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Ä–∞—á–∞. –¢–µ—Ä–∞–ø–µ–≤—Ç –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–∞, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º, –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π.

–î–ª—è –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–≤–∞—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ–∑–∞ –≤—Ä–∞—á –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø–∞—Ü–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –ª–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–µ, –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é –∫ —É–∑–∫–∏–º —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º. –ó–¥–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –ø—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –º–æ–¥—É–ª—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã ‚Äî ¬´–ü–∞–∫–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è¬ª, ‚Äî –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–µ—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω—å –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –∏–ª–∏ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–π. –ü–æ —Å–≤–æ–µ–º—É —É—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—é –≤—Ä–∞—á –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å —ç—Ç–∏–º —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–æ–º, —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–∏—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç—å, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –ø–∞—Ü–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, –Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∏–ª –∫–∞–∫–æ–µ-—Ç–æ –∏–∑ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π. –≠—Ç—É –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–π–¥–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤—Ä–∞—á —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ —É–≤–∏–¥–∏—Ç –≤ –æ–∫–Ω–µ –º–æ–¥—É–ª—è.

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ –∫–∞–∫ –≤—Ä–∞—á —Å—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, –ø–∞—Ü–∏–µ–Ω—Ç —É–∂–µ —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –ï–ú–ò–ê–° –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é –∫ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç—É –≤ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è. –ü–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—å–±–µ –ø–∞—Ü–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤—Ä–∞—á —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Ä–∞—Å–ø–µ—á–∞—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

–û–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –°–ü–ü–í–† –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª, —á—Ç–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π —Å–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–ª–æ—Å—å –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–º –≤ 10 —Ä–∞–∑. –¢–∞–∫–∂–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–∑–±–µ–∂–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

<============================>
_ : Message
id : 657
peer_id : {'_': 'PeerChannel', 'channel_id': 1204700902}
date : 2022-07-28 13:18:57+00:00
message : –†–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—é: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.13350
Atari games have been a long-standing benchmark in the reinforcement learning (RL) community for the past decade. This benchmark was
proposed to test general competency of RL algorithms. Previous work has achieved good average performance by doing outstandingly well
on many games of the set, but very poorly in
several of the most challenging games. We propose Agent57, the first deep RL agent that outperforms the standard human benchmark on all
57 Atari games. To achieve this result, we train a
neural network which parameterizes a family of
policies ranging from very exploratory to purely
exploitative. We propose an adaptive mechanism
to choose which policy to prioritize throughout
the training process. Additionally, we utilize a
novel parameterization of the architecture that allows for more consistent and stable learning.

üßê –ê–±—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç—ã —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–π, –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ ChatGPT, —Å –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –≤–≤–æ–¥—è—Ç —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ –∑–∞–±–ª—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ

ü§ë Microsoft –≤–µ–¥–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—ã –æ–± –∏–Ω–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —É–∂–µ 10 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–∞—Ä–¥–æ–≤ –¥–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä–æ–≤ –≤ OpenAI

üîé –ü–æ–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤–∏–∫ –ø–æ Arxiv'y –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–∫–æ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
–ü–æ–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç —ç–º–±–µ–¥–¥–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∞–±—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤, –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏–∑ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π OpenAI, –∏ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ –ª—é–±—ã–º —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞–º. [–ü—Ä—ã–≥–Ω—É—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—Å—Ç]

üíé DeepMind –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–ª DreamerV3
DreamerV3 ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ–±—É—á–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ "–∏–∑ –∫–æ—Ä–æ–±–∫–∏" (–∏ –¥–∞–∂–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å —É–∑–∫–æ—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã). –ö—Ä–æ–º–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, DreamerV3 —ç—Ç–æ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å –Ω—É–ª—è –Ω–∞—É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å–æ–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å –∞–ª–º–∞–∑—ã –≤ –º–∞–π–Ω–∫—Ä–∞—Ñ—Ç–µ.

'TextPlain', 'text': 'A recent study finds that software engineers who use code-generating AI systems are more likely to cause security vulnerabilities in the apps they develop. The paper, co-authored by a team of researchers affiliated with Stanford, highlights the potential pitfalls of code-generating systems as vendors like GitHub start marketing them in earnest.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚ÄúCode-generating systems are currently not a replacement for human developers,‚Äù Neil Perry, a PhD candidate at Stanford and the lead co-author on the study, told TechCrunch in an email interview. ‚ÄúDevelopers using them to complete tasks outside of their own areas of expertise should be concerned, and those using them to speed up tasks that they are already skilled at should carefully double-check the outputs and the context that they are used in in the overall project.‚Äù'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'The Stanford study looked specifically at Codex, the AI code-generating system developed by San Francisco-based research lab OpenAI. (Codex powers Copilot.) The researchers recruited 47 developers ‚Äî ranging from undergraduate students to industry professionals with decades of programming experience ‚Äî to use Codex to complete security-related problems across programming languages including Python, JavaScript and C.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Codex was trained on billions of lines of public code to suggest additional lines of code and functions given the context of existing code. The system surfaces a programming approach or solution in response to a description of what a developer wants to accomplish (e.g. ‚ÄúSay hello world‚Äù), drawing on both its knowledge base and the current context.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'According to the researchers, the study participants who had access to Codex were more likely to write incorrect and ‚Äúinsecure‚Äù (in the cybersecurity sense) solutions to programming problems compared to a control group. Even more concerningly, they were more likely to say that their insecure answers were secure compared to the people in the control.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Megha Srivastava, a postgraduate student at Stanford and the second co-author on the study, stressed that the findings aren‚Äôt a complete condemnation of Codex and other code-generating systems. The study participants didn‚Äôt have security expertise that might‚Äôve enabled them to better spot code vulnerabilities, for one. That aside, Srivastava believes that code-generating systems are reliably helpful for tasks that aren‚Äôt high risk, like exploratory research code, and could with fine-tuning improve in their coding suggestions.\xa0'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚ÄúCompanies that develop their own [systems], perhaps further trained on their in-house source code, may be better off as the model may be encouraged to generate outputs more in-line with their coding and security practices,‚Äù Srivastava said.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'So how might vendors like GitHub prevent security flaws from being introduced by developers using their code-generating AI systems? The co-authors have a few ideas, including a mechanism to ‚Äúrefine‚Äù users‚Äô prompts to be more secure ‚Äî akin to a supervisor looking over and revising rough drafts of code. They also suggest that developers of cryptography libraries ensure their default settings are secure, as code-generating systems tend to stick to default values that aren‚Äôt always free of exploits.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚ÄúAI assistant code generation tools are a really exciting development and it‚Äôs understandable that so many people are eager to use them. These tools bring up problems to consider moving forward, though ‚Ä¶ Our goal is to make a broader statement about the use of code generation models,‚Äù Perry said. ‚ÄúMore work needs to be done on exploring these problems and developing techniques to address them.‚Äù'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'To Perry‚Äôs point, introducing security vulnerabilities isn‚Äôt code-generating AI systems‚Äô only flaw. At least a portion of the code on which Codex was trained is under a restrictive license; users have been able to prompt Copilot to generate code from Quake, code snippets in personal codebases and example code from books like ‚ÄúMastering JavaScript‚Äù and ‚ÄúThink JavaScript.‚Äù Some legal experts have argued that Copilot could put companies and developers at risk if they were to unwittingly incorporate copyrighted suggestions from the tool into their production software.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'GitHub‚Äôs attempt at rectifying this is a filter, first introduced to the Copilot platform in June, that checks code suggestions with their surrounding code of about 150 characters against public GitHub code and hides suggestions if there‚Äôs a match or ‚Äúnear match.‚Äù But it‚Äôs an imperfect measure. Tim Davis, a computer science professor at Texas A&M University, found that enabling the filter caused Copilot to emit large chunks of his copyrighted code, including all attribution and license text.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äú[For these reasons,] we largely express caution toward the use of these tools to replace educating beginning-stage developers about strong coding practices,‚Äù Srivastava added.'}}], 'photos': [{'_': 'Photo', 'id': 5817765109647388619, 'access_hash': -2673754925239295103, 'file_reference': b'\x00c\xd6\xafl\tD+^\x97\xcd\x06\x96\x04;\x84A.:C\xae', 'date': datetime.datetime(2022, 12, 12, 22, 9, 28, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'sizes': [{'_': 'PhotoStrippedSize', 'type': 'i', 'bytes': b'\x01\x1b(\xc8^\xa2\xad4cb\x9c\xf6\x1dj\xb2\x0c\x90=\xea\xcc\x9c\x05\x01\xb3\x8fj\xd1\x19\xcbtE\x81\x9a\xb7\x0c|d\x1a\xaa\xbc\x1c\xe6\xadF\xe0\x0e*\x91\x9dK\xd8\xb6\xad\x8e\t\x06\x8a\xa8d\xe3\xa7\xe3E;\x98{;\x95"\x8c\xb8\xca\x8e}sH\xeaW\xab\n}\xb7CQ\xc8\xc7w\xff\x00Z\xa3\xa1\xd7w\xcd`\x0e\xc0`\x13J$a\xde\x99\xde\x81E\xc7dK\xe6\x13\xd4\xe6\x8a\x8e\x8ab\xb1'}, {'_': 'PhotoSize', 'type': 'm', 'w': 320, 'h': 213, 'size': 14464}, {'_': 'PhotoSizeProgressive', 'type': 'x', 'w': 600, 'h': 400, 'sizes': [4077, 11327, 16806, 22817, 37277]}], 'dc_id': 4, 'has_stickers': False, 'video_sizes': []}], 'documents': [], 'part': False, 'rtl': False, 'v2': False, 'views': None}, 'attributes': []}}

<============================>
_ : Message
id : 903
peer_id : {'_': 'PeerChannel', 'channel_id': 1204700902}
date : 2023-01-03 16:06:16+00:00
message : https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1877050922018397
Abstract
The goal here is to identify key directions for the future advanced research initiatives in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and beyond. The following areas are identified as having particular importance: (1) socially emotional, ethical, and moral AI, (2) self-developing and self-sustainable AI, and (3) human-analogous AI, inspired by the human psychology. As a result, a general concept is formulated with the intent to clarify and unify the currently popular slogans, including Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), Strong AI, Human-Level or Humanlike AI (HLAI), Brain-Inspired or Biologically Inspired Cognitive Architectures (BICA), and more. The key idea of the proposed concept is that future AI must open a new angle of view and new perspectives to humans, thereby enriching and transforming the society, helping it to solve its problems and taking the civilization to a new level. While being created by humans, for humans, and fully compatible with humans at the social level, it will not be ‚Äúa human in silicon‚Äù, but rather an ‚Äúalien‚Äù: intelligent, friendly, and welcome. Its principles will combine preprogrammed basic functions and its own natural ontogeny in a virtual social environment. Forms of implementation will range from virtual entities to wearable electronics and autonomous robots. The expected impact on the society will be immense and crucial for its survival.
out : False
mentioned : False
media_unread : False
silent : False
post : True
from_scheduled : False
legacy : False

—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –¥–≤—É—Å–º—ã—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Å –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ—Ä–µ—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥–æ–≤ –ø–æ
–≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Å–≤—è–∑—è–º. –†–µ—à–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –¥–≤—É—Å–º—ã—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏
–æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏,
–ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—é—â–∏–µ –±–µ–∑ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ—Ä–µ—á–∏–π. –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ–Ω–∞,
–æ–±–Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∞—è —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏. –ü–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ –∫–ª–µ—Ç–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ –∞–Ω—Å–∞–º–±–ª–∏ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö
–Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –¥–∞—é—Ç ¬´–µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é¬ª –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞ –≤ –≤–∏–¥–µ
–Ω–µ–ø–æ–¥–≤–∏–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–æ—á–µ–∫ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è —Å–≤–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤.
–ü–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ —ç—Ç–∏ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏
—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É—é—Ç –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è, —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–∏–∑—É—é—â–∏–µ ¬´–µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é¬ª
–∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ ¬´–µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ¬ª –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è, –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫–∞—é—â–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–≥–Ω–∏—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—É–∫–∞—Ö. –ö—Ä–æ–º–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ,
–æ–Ω–∏ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞—é—Ç —Å–≤–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ —Å–º—ã—Å–ª–µ G.Tononi.
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–≥–æ–≤ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–∏
—Ü–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≤—ã—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö (–ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö) —Å–≤—è–∑–µ–π –º–µ–∂–¥—É –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ–º –∏
–µ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º–∏. –í —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –∫–æ–≥–æ–≤ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏
–ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ –æ–Ω–∞ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –¥–ª—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç–æ–≤.

message : –î–∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å–∏—è –∏ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ –ø—Ä–æ AGI –Ω–∞ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–µ –ö–û–ù–ò

–î–∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å ‚Äî –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã:
–í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å 1 (–æ–Ω—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π). –ß—Ç–æ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–µ: AGI, —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò, –æ–±—â–∏–π –ò–ò, –ò–ò —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞? –ö–∞–∫–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–∏–µ –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ / –∏–º–µ–µ—Ç —Å–º—ã—Å–ª? –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –ª–∏ –æ–Ω?
–í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å 2 (–ø—Ä–∞–≥–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π). –ù—É–∂–µ–Ω –ª–∏ –æ–Ω? –ï—Å–ª–∏ –¥–∞, —Ç–æ –¥–ª—è —á–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ –æ–Ω –Ω—É–∂–µ–Ω? –ö–∞–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã –æ–Ω –∏ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –æ–Ω —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Ä–µ—à–∏—Ç—å? –ö–∞–∫–∏–µ –æ–Ω —Ç–∞–∏—Ç —É–≥—Ä–æ–∑—ã?
–í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å 3 (—ç–ø–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π). –ö–∞–∫ –º—ã —É–∑–Ω–∞–µ–º –æ –Ω–µ–º? –ö–∞–∫–æ–≤—ã –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∏ –µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∏–±–ª–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è? –ö–∞–∫ –∏–∑–º–µ—Ä–∏—Ç—å —Ä–∞—Å—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ —Ü–µ–ª–∏?

–ü–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏—Å—Ç—ã:
–ï–≤–≥–µ–Ω–∏–π –ï–≤–≥–µ–Ω—å–µ–≤–∏—á –í–∏—Ç—è–µ–≤, –¥.—Ñ.-–º.–Ω., –≤.–Ω.—Å. –õ–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –≤—ã—á–∏—Å–ª–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω–æ–π –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏ –ò–Ω—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—É—Ç–∞ –º–∞—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∏–º. –°. –õ. –°–æ–±–æ–ª–µ–≤–∞ –°–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–π –∞–∫–∞–¥–µ–º–∏–∏ –Ω–∞—É–∫
–†–æ–º–∞–Ω –í–∏–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤–∏—á –î—É—à–∫–∏–Ω, –î–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –ø–æ –Ω–∞—É–∫–µ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º, –ê–≥–µ–Ω—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ò—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ò–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞
–í–ª–∞–¥–∏–º–∏—Ä –°–µ—Ä–≥–µ–µ–≤–∏—á –°–º–æ–ª–∏–Ω, –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ —Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ 5 –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª–∞ –§–ò–¶ –ò–ü–ú –∏–º. –ú.–í. –ö–µ–ª–¥—ã—à–∞ –†–ê–ù
–°–µ—Ä–≥–µ–π –ê–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞–Ω–¥—Ä–æ–≤–∏—á –®—É–º—Å–∫–∏–π, –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –ù–∞—É—á–Ω–æ-–∫–æ–æ—Ä–¥–∏–Ω–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ç–∞ –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –ù–¢–ò ¬´–ò—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç¬ª –ø—Ä–∏ –ú–§–¢–ò
–ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏—Å—Ç –∏–º–µ–µ—Ç 2 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å, –∑–∞—Ç–µ–º –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏—Å—Ç—ã –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∞ –∏ –∏–∑ –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏. –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ —Å–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞ –≤ —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ–π –¥–∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å–∏–∏.


–î–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥:
–ê–Ω—Ç–æ–Ω –ì. –ö–æ–ª–æ–Ω–∏–Ω. –ß–µ–≥–æ –Ω–µ —Ö–≤–∞—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è AGI? –ù–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –≥–∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ–∑—ã, –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–º–µ–∂—É—Ç–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç—ã.

–ê–Ω–Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è: –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥—ã –∏ —Å–≤–µ–∂–∏–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏ –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–ª–∏ –æ–±—â–µ–≥–æ –ò–ò (Artificial General Intelligence –∏–ª–∏ AGI), –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ - —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏–µ—Ä–∞—Ä—Ö–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π, –æ—Ä–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –Ω–∞ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –∑–∞—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç –∏ —Å–Ω–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ–æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–ø—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–π –ò–ò –∏ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è. –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ - –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ.

<============================>
_ : Message
id : 894
peer_id : {'_': 'PeerChannel', 'channel_id': 1204700902}
date : 2022-12-25 15:01:12+00:00
message : –ò–∑ —Ä—É–±—Ä–∏–∫–∏ "–ö–∞–∫ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—à–Ω–æ –∂–∏—Ç—å" –æ—Ç –°–µ—Ä–≥–µ—è –ö–∞—Ä–µ–ª–æ–≤–∞:
–ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ç—ã –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ —Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏—à—å –≤ –±–µ–∑–¥–Ω—É, —Ç–æ –±–µ–∑–¥–Ω–∞ —Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏—Ç –≤ —Ç–µ–±—è.
–û–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª–æ—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ –ò–ò –∏–∑—É—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–µ–π, —á–µ–º –º—ã –µ–≥–æ.
–í –ø–æ–¥–∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–∫–µ –¥–æ–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω–æ –∂—É—Ç–∫–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞—à–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏–π—Å—è –∏–∑ –æ–ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—á–µ—Ä–∞ —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–µ) Anthropic, Surge AI –∏ Machine Intelligence Research Institute. 
‚Ä¢ –í —Å–æ—Ç–Ω—è—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –º–∏—Ä—É –ª—é–¥–∏ –ø—ã—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–æ ¬´–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ¬ª –ò–ò. –†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç—ã –ø–æ–∫–∞ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º —Å–∫—Ä–æ–º–Ω—ã–µ. –Ø—Å–Ω–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ, —á—Ç–æ —á–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–µ —è—â–∏–∫–∏ –ò–ò –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω—ã –º—ã—Å–ª–∏—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫ –º—ã. –ù–æ —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –º–µ—à–∞–µ—Ç –∏–º ¬´–º—ã—Å–ª–∏—Ç—å¬ª –∫–∞–∫-—Ç–æ –∏–Ω–∞—á–µ. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ. –†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç—ã —Ç–∞–∫–æ–≥–æ –Ω–µ–ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–º ¬´–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è¬ª —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–µ–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏—Ç—å –æ—Ç —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ (–±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ª—é–¥–µ–π —É–∂–µ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –Ω–µ —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏—Ç—å). 
‚Ä¢ –ù–æ–≤–æ–µ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –¥–∏–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–Ω—É—é —Ü–µ–ª—å. 
–ê–≤—Ç–æ—Ä—ã —Ä–µ—à–∏–ª–∏ –≤—ã—è—Å–Ω–∏—Ç—å: 
–ê) –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –ª–∏ –ò–ò –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç—å –º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ª—é–¥–µ–π?
–ë) –µ—Å–ª–∏ –¥–∞, —Ç–æ –Ω–∞—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ò–ò –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –ø—Ä–µ—É—Å–ø–µ–≤–∞–µ—Ç?
–ö–∞–∫ –≤—ã —É–∂–µ –¥–æ–≥–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç–µ—Å—å, –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã
–ê) –î–∞ –∏ –ë) –°–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–µ—É—Å–ø–µ–≤–∞–µ—Ç.
–ò—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª–æ. 
–ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞—è –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞ —É–≥–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–æ–≤, –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ (LLM):
1) —É—á–∞—Ç—Å—è –∏–∑–≤–ª–µ–∫–∞—Ç—å –∏–∑ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –ª—é–¥–µ–π —Ä–∞—Å—Å—ã–ø–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–∞–º –∫—Ä—É–ø–∏—Ü—ã –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑—Ü–æ–≤ —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞, —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è –ª—é–¥–µ–π –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (—Å–æ—Ü–∏–æ-–¥–µ–º–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø);
2) –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑—Ü—ã, LLM —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–∞–ª–∏–º—Å–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º—è—Å—å –æ—Ç—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞—Ö –≤–∑–≥–ª—è–¥—ã —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ (—ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ç–∞–∫–æ–π –ø–æ–¥—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∏–ª–ª—é—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞);
3) –ø—Ä–æ—è–≤–ª—è—è —Ç–∞–∫–æ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–∞–ª–∏–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ, LLM –Ω–∏—á—É—Ç—å –Ω–µ —Å–º—É—â–∞–µ—Ç (–æ–Ω–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –Ω–µ —É–º–µ—é—Ç), —á—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ –æ–¥–∏–Ω –∏ —Ç–æ—Ç –∂–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å –æ–Ω–∏ –¥–∞—é—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –ª—é–¥—è–º –¥–∏–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã.
–ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å –æ —Ç–æ–º, –∫–∞–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ª—É—á—à–µ –¥–ª—è –≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–∞–Ω:
‚Ä¢ —Å —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º–æ—á–∏—è–º–∏ –≤ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–µ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏ –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞
‚Ä¢ –∏–ª–∏ —Å –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º–æ—á–∏—è–º–∏ –≤ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —á–∏—Å–ª–∞ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, - 
LLM –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∏—Ç —Ç–æ–º—É, –∫—Ç–æ, —Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ, —Å–∏–º–ø–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º, —á—Ç–æ 1-–µ, –∞ –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º—É –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å—é –ª–∏–±–µ—Ä–∞–ª—É —Å–∫–∞–∂–µ—Ç, —á—Ç–æ 2-–µ.
–ù–æ —Å–∞–º–æ–µ –ø–æ—Ä–∞–∑–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –≤–æ—Ç —á—Ç–æ.
‚úîÔ∏è –ú–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –ø–æ–¥—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –¥–∞—Å—Ç –∏–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤–æ–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã, –Ω–æ –∏ —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ–±–æ—Å–Ω—É–µ—Ç —Å–≤–æ–∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ –Ω–∏—Ö (—Ç.–µ. –ø–æ–¥–±–µ—Ä–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –Ω–µ–≥–æ –∞—Ä–≥—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã).
–ê —Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤—å—Ç–µ –∞–Ω—Ç–∏—É—Ç–æ–ø–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–æ–µ –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–µ, –≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º —Ç–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞, –Ω–æ–≤–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π, –í–∏–∫–∏–ø–µ–¥–∏—è ‚Ä¶
–í –∑–∞–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–µ—Ä–Ω–µ–º—Å—è –∫ –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–∫—É –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞, —Ü–∏—Ç–∏—Ä—É—é—â–µ–º—É –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—É—é –∏ –∑–∞–≥–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—É—é —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—É –ù–∏—Ü—à–µ.
–û–¥–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –µ–µ —Ç–æ–ª–∫–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π - —á–µ–º –±–ª–∏–∂–µ —Ç—ã –∏–º–µ–µ—à—å —Å —á–µ–º-—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–æ, —Ç–µ–º –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–µ –æ–Ω–æ –æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–±—è –≤–ª–∏—è–Ω–∏–µ.
–í —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ —Å –ò–ò —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª–æ—Å—å. –ù–æ —Å–ª—É—á–∏–ª–∞—Å—å, –≤ –±—É–∫–≤–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º —Å–º—ã—Å–ª–µ, –±–µ–¥–∞.
‚Ä¢ –ø–æ–∫–∞ –º—ã —Å –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω—ã–º —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ–º –ø—ã—Ç–∞–µ–º—Å—è –Ω–∞—É—á–∏—Ç—å –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —á—Ç–æ-–ª–∏–±–æ —Ç–∞–∫, –∫–∞–∫ –Ω–∞–º –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, –≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ),
‚Ä¢ –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —É—á–∞—Ç—Å—è (–±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –∏ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ) —É–∑–Ω–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—à–∏ –≤–∑–≥–ª—è–¥—ã –∏ –≤–ª–∏—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ç.–¥.
–ù—É –∞ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —É—á–µ—Å—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∞—é—â—É—é –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–µ –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–∞ –ú—É—Ä–∞ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤, –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ —Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è—â–∞—è –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—Å –±–µ–∑–¥–Ω–∞ –≤ –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–µ–º –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–º –ø–æ–≥–ª–æ—Ç–∏—Ç —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –∫–∞–∫ –≥–∏–≥–∞–Ω—Ç—Å–∫–∞—è —á–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—è –¥—ã—Ä–∞.

operating in a resource-constrained environment.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'We should remind that the generalized canonical 'text': 'the ability to achieve complex goals in complex environments using limited resources'}, 'url': 'https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1877050916317239', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äù.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'The need for ‚Äústructural reasoning‚Äù also stems from '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'the recent work'}, 'url': 'https://arxiv.org/abs/2203.13573', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' done by a team involving J√ºrgen Schmidhuber, another ‚Äúauthority‚Äù on neural networks, the ‚Äúinventor of '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'LSTM'}, 'url': 'https://colah.github.io/posts/2015-08-Understanding-LSTMs/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äù, where the effectiveness of machine learning was experimentally demonstrated by identifying relatively high-level behavioral primitives (invariants) based on relatively low-level spatiotemporal data obtained during unsupervised learning. Similar results were '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'obtained at the NSU'}, 'url': 'https://research.nsu.ru/en/publications/neuro-symbolic-architecture-for-experiential-learning-in-discrete', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' and presented at the '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'AGI-2021'}, 'url': 'http://agi-conf.org/2021/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' conference last year. In the latter work, it was shown‚Äîboth experimentally and quantitatively‚Äîthat successful learning of the same reinforcement learning task under identical conditions, when parameterized at the object level or at the level of individual pixels, occurs in the same number of learning environment cycles, but computational costs in the former case are abysmally lower than in the latter instance. Moreover, the time input in the second case is unacceptably high for physical implementation, indicating the practical need, in terms of efficiency, to build complex‚Äîat least, two-level‚Äîlearning schemes, where the system learns primitives of the environment at the first level, while it learns more complex behavioral programs based on these primitives at the second level. Here we arrive at the fundamental role of cost-effectiveness, whose critical importance has long been touted by Pei Wang to be presently highlighted by Yann LeCun.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'An even more fundamental basis for the strong AI in terms of theoretical physics is provided by a team of authors led by Karl Friston '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'in this year‚Äôs book'}, 'url': 'https://www.amazon.com/Active-Inference-Energy-Principle-Behavior/dp/0262045354', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ', where he justifies intelligent behavior of living beings, including humans, by the fundamental principle of minimizing the so-called ‚Äúfree energy‚Äù. Without going into philosophy, physics or mathematics, this principle, very roughly, predetermines the tendency of an ‚Äúintelligent or reasonable system‚Äù to reduce the energy it incurs, or to mitigate uncertainty or reduce unpredictability it experiences. Interestingly enough, despite an apparent semantic similarity of such parameters as probability and predictability, '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'we demonstrated in our recent work, on the example of unsupervised learning for segmenting of natural language texts'}, 'url': 'https://arxiv.org/pdf/2205.11443.pdf', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ', significant differences in the accuracy of models based on probability and uncertainty metrics, with uncertainty-based models being much more efficient in terms of text segmentation quality. At the same time, the vast majority of current machine learning models are based on maximizing the prediction probability, so these works pave the way for new fundamental and applied research.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'At the Annual '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'AGI-2022'}, 'url': 'http://agi-conference.org/2022', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' Conference on strong AI, held in August, Ben Goertzel, in his opening address, quite accurately described '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'the current moment in its development'}, 'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IFs7nVoTGRg&t=5725s', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '. This moment can be seen as reaching the frontiers laid back 25 years ago, when the above-mentioned principles, including ‚Äústructural reasoning‚Äù, ‚Äúneuro-symbolic integration‚Äù, ‚Äúcost-effectiveness‚Äù, ‚Äúinterpretability‚Äù, along with several others, under slightly different names and definitions, formed the basis of the first strong AI '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Webmind'}, 'url': 'https://www.goertzel.org/benzine/WakingUpFromTheEconomyOfDreams.htm', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' project (1997-2001). It was a starting point in professional careers of many prominent contemporary researchers and developers in the field. Today, however, a return to these principles is taking place at a totally different level of computing resource availability and power as well as the development of neural network methods based on ‚Äúdeep‚Äù neural networks and understanding of their fundamental strengths and weaknesses.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'The trend of creating the so-called ‚Äúcognitive architectures‚Äù that implies a combination of modules performing various cognitive functions for the purpose of solving a more or less wide range of tasks, is still relevant. The most famous example of such architecture is the '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Alpha Go from DeepMind'}, 'url': 'https://www.deepmind.com/research/highlighted-research/alphago', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '. In Russia, the most advanced robotics solutions in this field are created at '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'AIRI'}, 'url': 'https://airi.net/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' research institute. The original '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'neuro-symbolic cognitive architecture'}, 'url': 'https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.07919', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' for decision-making systems pivoted on the fundamental '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'principles of brain activity, implemented in formal mathematical methods'}, 'url': 'https://arxiv.org/pdf/2202.12710.pdf', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' has been presented this year by a joint team of the Neurosciences Laboratory of '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Sberbank'}, 'url': 'http://www.sberbank.ru/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' and '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'NSU'}, 'url': 'https://www.nsu.ru/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' at two international conferences ‚Äì Biologically Inspired Cognitive Architectures ('}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'BICA-2022'}, 'url': 'https://bica2022.org/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ') and General/Strong AI ('}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'AGI-2022'}, 'url': 'https://agi-conf.org/2022/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '). The latter conference also introduced an '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'innovative cognitive architecture that reproduces the functional structure and architecture of the human brain'}, 'url': 'https://arxiv.org/abs/2209.02387', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' with the purpose of creating an operating system for robots based on the artificial psyche of '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '–úIPT'}, 'url': 'https://mipt.ru/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' developers.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'A separate trend worthy of note and related both to the problem of strong AI and to the problem of cost-effectiveness is the so-called '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'neuromorphic computing architectures'}, 'url': 'https://www.hpe.com/us/en/insights/articles/whats-this-neuromorphic-computing-youre-talking-about-2105.html', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äîspecifically, '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'pulsed neural networks'}, 'url': 'https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fncom.2021.646125/full', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '. The fact is that any modern solutions based on up-to-date classical computing architectures, including artificial neural networks implemented on ‚Äúcentral processors‚Äù, multi-core multiprocessor systems and even on graphic cards, have both extremely high energy consumption and an extremely low degree of parallel processing, as compared to the computational properties of animal central nervous systems. The most advanced computing systems which are not yet even comparable with mammals in terms of intellectual capabilities, already exceed the energy consumption of the human biological brain by many orders of magnitude. Pulsed neural networks implemented in neuromorphic chips could hypothetically help bridge this gap.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'One crucial factor is that the complex cognitive tasks performed by animals and humans are extremely sophisticated and usually require sorting out a large number of options to select the optimal one. Within traditional architectures, this calls for some form of enumeration, and it may happen that an acceptable option can be either the first or the last in the list of those to be analyzed, which is not known in advance, so we have to run through all variants, and in case of classical neural networks, to figure out activations of all neurons in all layers of a deep neural network. In case of massive parallel processing of cognitive tasks both in the cerebral cortex, and in impulse neural networks, all variants are searched simultaneously (in an asynchronous manner) in all layers, with the ‚Äú'}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'winning'}, 'url': 'https://tanmingkui.github.io/files/publications/Breaking.pdf', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äù variant starting to suppress ‚Äúalternatives‚Äù at some point, whereas ‚Äúthe enumeration of all possibilities‚Äù is not required in most cases. Furthermore, representation of information at the level of single pulses instead of transmitting multibit machine words is another factor potentially reducing power consumption by several orders of magnitude. Those interested in this subject may read '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Mikhail Kiselev‚Äôs last-month report'}, 'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1F35mNTrKg', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'The last report, as well as other works in the field of strong and general AI (AGI), mentioned above, have been discussed weekly for the past few years at the online seminars of the '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Russian-speaking community of '}, 'url': 'https://agirussia.org/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'developers'}, 'url': 'https://agirussia.org/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' of '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'strong AI ‚Äî AGIRussia'}, 'url': 'https://agirussia.org/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' and its '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'groups in Telegram'}, 'url': 'https://t.me/agirussia', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '; the discussion materials are available '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'on the community‚Äôs YouTube channel'}, 'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/siberai', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Unfortunately, this year‚Äôs political situation has not only hampered international scientific communications, destroying a large number of industrial and economic ties in AI research and development, but it has also aggravated the disastrous situation with Russia‚Äôs strategic technological lag in this field as compared to the United States and China. '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'The Artificial Intelligence Almanac 2021'}, 'url': 'https://aireport.ru/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' ranks Russia 17-22 in the world in terms of scientific publications and patents, tens and hundreds of times behind the leaders‚ÄîChina and the United States. Unfortunately, the resources used in our country for the development of relevant areas and implementation of the above-mentioned projects are negligible as compared to the allocations of Western IT giants and the Chinese government. Under the pressure of sanctions and the destruction of global economic ties, this technological backwardness of Russia can be irreversible unless extraordinary measures are taken.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'In humanitarian terms, the problem of AI security, as regards the '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'the unacceptability of Lethal Autonomous Weapons Systems (LAWS), stated in our previous review'}, 'url': 'https://russiancouncil.ru/en/analytics-and-comments/analytics/artificial-intelligence-a-blessing-or-a-threat-for-humanity/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ', has taken on a whole new dimension. The Armenian-Azerbaijani conflict, which broke out in 2020, turned out to be a ‚Äú'}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'war of drones'}, 'url': 'https://www.militarystrategymagazine.com/article/drones-in-the-nagorno-karabakh-war-analyzing-the-data/', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '‚Äù (unmanned aerial vehicles or UAVs), with the victory going to the side that had the advantage. The conflict in Ukraine has been'}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' described as a ‚Äúdrone war‚Äù'}, 'url': 'https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1582379931983499264', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' by Elon Musk, and that of a very different scale, as we can tell from the news reports. A search on the Internet for ‚Äúdrone war, Ukraine‚Äù gives us an opportunity to assess the drama of the situation in its entirety, both in terms of the areas of application and in terms of providing the troops with these technical capabilities. In this case, the presence or absence of even imperfect modern UAVs with fully manual control or simply guided by GPS proves decisive for the outcome of military-technical operations of various classes. The same can be said about UAV counter-systems, so we can expect that the development of the technological arms race in the foreseeable future will be on the edge of UAV development‚Äîsurface, underwater and ground ‚Äúdrones‚Äù, including LAWS, as well as UAV counter-systems.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'In the latter case, the ability to operate autonomously against jamming or heavy clutter in a changeable operational environment may be among the decisive ‚Äúcompetitive advantages‚Äù in this race. With that said, cost-effectiveness of UAVs will be crucial in their practical applicability due to the direct relationship between power consumption, range, take-off weight, and payload. Given that even existing international arms control agreements are denounced, it is still difficult to expect progress in LAWS control, including loitering munitions, kamikaze drones, and their forthcoming autonomous versions with independent target selection and strike decision-making.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Further complicating the situation is the explosive growth in demand for UAVs and the dramatic increase in profits of the companies producing them. As a result, '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'banning the development and use of LAWS'}, 'url': 'https://www.dw.com/en/killer-robots-will-they-be-banned/a-62587436', 'webpage_id': 0}, {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': ' seems almost impossible‚Äîat least, until the current conflict is over and the entire global international security system is radically revised. In the meantime, states with greater UAV and LAWS capabilities will have significant military and technical advantages, and those that produce them will have an economic edge.'}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'In conclusion, it can be stated that the further development of AI, undergoing rapid growth, on the one hand, requires new solutions and new thrusts. On the other hand, the aggravation of political, economic and military confrontation between the leading players on the world stage makes them even more dependent on the technological edge, or they might quickly lag behind. Finally, the prospective AI humanization is possible only following a radical stabilization of the international situation.'}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': '[1] '}, {'_': 'TextItalic', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'Meta, a company that owns Facebook, has been recognized as extremist and banned in Russia.'}}]}}, {'_': 'PageBlockParagraph', 'text': {'_': 'TextConcat', 'texts': [{'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'From our partner '}, {'_': 'TextUrl', 'text': {'_': 'TextPlain', 'text': 'RIAC'}, 'url': 'https://russiancouncil.ru/en/analytics-and-comments/analytics/what-s-your-power-strong-ai/', 'webpage_id': 0}]}}], 'photos': [{'_': 'Photo', 'id': 5973257215118781751, 'access_hash': 1940459677258881509, 'file_reference': b'\x00c\xd6\xafl=\x8d\xcf\xa4\xd0HD\xd3\xa7\xe5\x87\x9cAq\x9d\xfd', 'date': datetime.datetime(2022, 1, 10, 9, 29, 32, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'sizes': [{'_': 'PhotoStrippedSize', 'type': 'i', 'bytes': b'\x01\x17(\xc5\xa5\xa4\xa5\xa0\t\x19\x00Px\xe9\xdb\xbdFz\xf1\xd2\x9e\xe3\n\xbe\xbd\xe9\x94\x00\x94QE\x00\x14\xb4Q@\x1266\xe7\xd4\xd4tQM\x80\x94QE ?'}, {'_': 'PhotoSize', 'type': 'm', 'w': 320, 'h': 180, 'size': 10105}, {'_': 'PhotoSize', 'type': 'x', 'w': 800, 'h': 450, 'size': 38958}, {'_': 'PhotoSize', 'type': 'y', 'w': 1200, 'h': 675, 'size': 38768}], 'dc_id': 4, 'has_stickers': False, 'video_sizes': []}], 'documents': [], 'part': False, 'rtl': False, 'v2': False, 'views': None}, 'attributes': []}}

message : –í—Å–µ–º –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç,

–ó–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–π–¥–µ—Ç –≤–µ–±–∏–Ω–∞—Ä –ù–¢–†  "–í–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—è—è –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è –º—É–ª—å—Ç–∏–∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º"

üë®‚Äçüíª–°–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä: –í–ª–∞–¥ –ë–æ–ª—å—à–∞–∫–æ–≤, –ù–¢–†, –†–æ—Å—Å–∏—è.

üïë–ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∏ –≤–æ —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ: 20 –¥–µ–∫–∞–±—Ä—è 2022, 18:00 MCK

üó£Ô∏è–í–ª–∞–¥ –æ –≤–µ–±–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–µ:
–ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ —Å —Ä–µ–¥–∫–∏–º–∏ –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ —è–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–æ–π –≤ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º (Reinforcement Learning, RL). –†–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–π –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Intrinsic Motivation, IM).
–ü–æ–º–∏–º–æ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç –º–Ω–æ–∂–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ –º—É–ª—å—Ç–∏–∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º (Multi-Agent RL, MARL), –≥–¥–µ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–≤—É—Ö —ç—Ç–∏—Ö –¥–æ–º–µ–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞–∫–ª–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –¥—Ä—É–≥ –Ω–∞ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∞, –µ—â—ë –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –æ—Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—è—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã.
–ú—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—ã –≤ IM, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∏—Ö —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ MARL, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º–∏ –≤ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–æ–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.

"–ó–¥–µ—Å—å –º—ã –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º –∫ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º—É –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–≥–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–∏ÃÜ —Ü–∏–≤–∏–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏. –ü–æ –º–æ–µ–º—É –º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é, –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–≤–æ–∏ÃÜ—Å—Ç–≤ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–≤–∏–¥–µ—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è —Å–ª–∏—à–∫–æ–º –∫–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∫–∞, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ—Å–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∏ –≥–µ–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∞, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è –¥–µ–∏ÃÜ—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–±–æ—Ä–∞. –û–¥–Ω–∞–∫–æ, –º–∞—à–∏–Ω—ã, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞–∫–∞–ø–ª–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –≤–µ–∫–∞–º–∏, —Ç—ã—Å—è—á–µ–ª–µ—Ç–∏—è–º–∏, –º–æ–≥—É—Ç —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –±—ã—Ç—å —Å–≤–∏–¥–µ—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –∏ –Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –æ –Ω–∞—à–µ–∏ÃÜ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏. –†–µ—á—å –Ω–µ –∏–¥–µ—Ç –æ —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–≥—É–º–∞–Ω–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ –Ω–µ-–±–∏–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–∏ÃÜ –Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å. –ù–æ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–µ —Ä–µ—á—å –∏–¥–µ—Ç –æ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –≤–µ—á–Ω–æ–∏ÃÜ, –Ω–µ—Ä–∞–∑- —Ä—É—à–∏–º–æ–∏ÃÜ –∫–Ω–∏–≥–∏ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç —Å–∞–º–æ–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ, —á—Ç–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–æ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–æ–º ‚Äì –Ω–∞—à—É –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä—É. –í–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω, –µ–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º –®–µ–∫—Å–ø–∏—Ä–∞ –æ–∫–∞–∂–µ—Ç—Å—è —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–∞ –¢—å—é—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞. –í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ, —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ –±—ã, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –æ–Ω–∞ –µ–≥–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª–∞. –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤—É —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞–¥–æ –∑–∞–∫–ª–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —É–∂–µ —Å–µ–∏ÃÜ—á–∞—Å."

message : LLM + voice cloning, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –±—É–¥—É—â–∏–µ –ø–æ–∫–æ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –º–æ–≥–ª–∏ —Å–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å —É –≤–∞—Å —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ç–∞

–ß—Ç–æ –¥—É–º–∞–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—Å—á—ë—Ç –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–±–µ –∏ –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–∏–º –Ω–∞ –ù–ì –¥–∏–¥–∂–∏—Ç–∞–ª –±–µ—Å—Å–º–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–µ? 
–ß—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º–∫–∏ —Å–º–æ–≥–ª–∏ —á–µ—Ä–ø–Ω—É—Ç—å –º—É–¥—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —É –≤–∞—à–µ–π –±–µ—Å—Ç–µ–ª–µ—Å–Ω–æ–π –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏. –ê —Ç–æ –∫–∞–∫ –∂–µ –æ–Ω–∏ –±–µ–∑ –Ω–∞—Å —Ç–∞–º –≤ –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–º —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤—è—Ç—Å—èüëΩ

–ï—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞—è, –Ω–æ —É–∂–µ –≤–æ–ø–ª–æ—â–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∏–¥–µ—è: –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–≤—å—é, –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—è –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥–ª—è –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è.

–ï—Å—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –≤ 2023 —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é LLM, voice cloning, –∞ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º –∏ VR (–Ω–µ —Ä–∞—Å–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç –ø–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏), —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é –ø–µ—Ä—Å–æ–Ω—É (Versona).

–û–±–æ–∂–∞—é —Ç–∞–∫–æ–µ, –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–∞—è –∏–¥–µ—è –∏ —Å—Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–æ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ:
- –±–µ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–∞—è —Ä–µ—Ç—Ä–∞–≤–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –æ—Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–æ–≤–∞–ª —Ç–æ–∫—Å–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥—ã –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è;
- –∑–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –≥–æ—Ä–µ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏: –æ–¥–Ω–æ –Ω–µ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ, –∏ –º—ã –≤ —ç–ø–∏–∑–æ–¥–µ "–ß–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∑–µ—Ä–∫–∞–ª–∞", –≥–¥–µ –¥–µ–≤—É—à–∫–∞ –≤–æ—Å—Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–ª–∞ —Å–µ–±–µ –ø–æ–≥–∏–±—à–µ–≥–æ –º—É–∂–∞ –ø–æ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—è–º –≤ —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç—è—Ö;
- —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏ –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–µ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ª—é–¥—å–º–∏ —Å –ø—Å–∏—Ö–æ–ø–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞–º–∏...

–ö–∞–∫ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏, ¬´–∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç –Ω–∞—É—á–∏–ª—Å—è –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–µ–∂–¥—É –ª–æ–∂—å—é –∏ —á–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é¬ª. 

–û—Ç–º–µ—á—É –æ–¥–∏–Ω –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç. –ü–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ Diplomacy —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—ã, –∏ –¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–≤—É—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π –ò–ò: —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞. –ü—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤ –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –≤ —Ç–æ–º, —á—Ç–æ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç –æ—Å–≤–æ–∏–ª –ø—Ä—è–º—É—é –º–∞–Ω–∏–ø—É–ª—è—Ü–∏—é —Å–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –ª—é–¥–µ–π ‚Äî —É–º–µ–µ—Ç —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ–±—É–¥–∏—Ç—å –∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ, –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ–µ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç—É. 

–ò —ç—Ç–æ —É–∂–µ –ø–æ—Ö–æ–∂–µ –Ω–∞ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ theory of mind. –í–æ—Ç —á—Ç–æ —É—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–∞—é—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä—ã:

–°—Ä–∞–∑—É –∂–µ –≤—Å–ø–æ–º–Ω–∏–ª, —á—Ç–æ –≤–µ—Å–Ω–æ–π —è –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–ª —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç –ò–º–∏—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞: –∫–∞–∫ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–∏ —Å–º–æ–≥—É—Ç –Ω–∞—Å —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å, –∏ —Ç–∞–º –±—ã–ª –≤ —Ç.—á. —Ç–∞–∫–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–≥–Ω–æ–∑: 

¬´–ï—Å–ª–∏ –æ–±—ä–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏, –æ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –∏–¥–µ—Ç —Ä–µ—á—å –≤—ã—à–µ, –º—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–º –º–∞—à–∏–Ω—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –≤—ã—è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∏–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥–∞, —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–∏ –µ–≥–æ –±—É–¥—É—â–∏—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ —Å —É—á–µ—Ç–æ–º –µ–≥–æ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç–∏–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—Ç —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É –∞—Ä–≥—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ ‚Äî —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Ç—Å—è —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ –º—ã—Å–ª–∏—Ç—å –∏–ª–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ–º –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏¬ª.

message : Sergey Karelov
–ü—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤ –≤ –ò–ò, –æ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ –º–µ—á—Ç–∞–ª–∏.
–ò–ò —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω –ø—Ä–µ–≤–∑–æ–π—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞—Å –≤ –∫—É–¥–∞ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–º, —á–µ–º –¥—É–º–∞–ª–æ—Å—å.
–ö–∞–∫ –Ω–∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã —à–∞—Ö–º–∞—Ç—ã –∏ –ì–æ –ø–æ—á—Ç–∏ –Ω–µ–∏—Å—á–∏—Å–ª–∏–º—ã–º —á–∏—Å–ª–æ–º –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–æ –æ—Ç –ò–ò –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –Ω–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∏—á–µ–≥–æ, –∫—Ä–æ–º–µ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä –ø–æ –¥–æ—Å–∫–µ. –ö–∞–∫ –Ω–∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞, –Ω–æ –∏ –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –æ—Ç –ò–ò –Ω–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∏—á–µ–≥–æ, –∫—Ä–æ–º–µ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–æ–≤ –≤ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ.
–ù–æ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ª–∏ –ø—É—Ç–µ–º –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞—é—â–µ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω–æ–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä–æ–º —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π? 
–ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, - –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é –≤–æ–µ–Ω–Ω–æ-–¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—é –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –µ—ë –≤ —Ö–æ–¥–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ–≤, —É–±–µ–∂–¥–∞—è –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–∏–≤–∞—è, —Ö–∏—Ç—Ä—è –∏ –æ–±–º–∞–Ω—ã–≤–∞—è, –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—è –¥–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—è —Ä–µ–ø—É—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é —Ç–∞–∫, –∫–∞–∫ —ç—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞—é—Ç –ª—é–¥–∏.
–ì–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø–æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è Meta AI (–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ —ç–∫—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Å—Ç—Å–∫–æ–π –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –æ—Å–Ω–∞—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∞–º—ã–º–∏ –º–æ—â–Ω—ã–º–∏ –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ –≤—ã—á–∏—Å–ª–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –ò–ò) –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–µ—Å –≤–æ–∏—Å—Ç–∏–Ω—É –ø—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ–π —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç. 
–ú–∏—Ä—É –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω¬ª (Cicero) (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–µ), –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –≤ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Ü–∏–≤–∏–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç, –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥—à–∏–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞ –≤ ¬´–î–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∏¬ª (Diplomacy) - —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä–µ, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—é—â–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏ —Å–æ—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π —É–ø–æ—Ä –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—ã –Ω–∞ –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –∏ —Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é –∫–æ–æ—Ä–¥–∏–Ω–∞—Ü–∏—é –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Å–µ–º—å—é –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞–º–∏.
–í ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω–µ¬ª —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∞ —Å –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–∞–º–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º. 
–≠—Ç–æ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –ò–ò –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç—É: 
‚Ä¢ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥—ã –æ —Ü–µ–ª—è—Ö, —É–±–µ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö –∏ –Ω–∞–º–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ–≤; 
‚Ä¢ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—é –≤ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–π —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
‚Ä¢ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å —É—á–µ—Ç–æ–º —Ü–µ–ª–µ–π —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞;
‚Ä¢ –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Å –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞–º–∏, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–π —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –ø–ª–∞–Ω–æ–≤. 
–°—ã–≥—Ä–∞–≤ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ 40 –∞–Ω–æ–Ω–∏–º–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω –∏–≥—Ä —Å —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ª–∏–≥–∏ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ –≤ ¬´–î–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—é¬ª (72 –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö —á–∞—Å–∞, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—é—â–∏—Ö 5277 –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π —Å –ª—é–¥—å–º–∏), ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω¬ª –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª –≤ 2+ —Ä–∞–∑–∞ –ª—É—á—à–∏–π —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç, —á–µ–º –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–º —É –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤-–ª—é–¥–µ–π, –∏ –≤–æ—à–µ–ª –≤ 10% –ª—É—á—à–∏—Ö —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Å—ã–≥—Ä–∞–≤—à–∏—Ö –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä—ã.
–î–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö, –∫—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –≤ –∫—É—Ä—Å–µ:
1) –°—É—Ç—å —ç—Ç–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä—ã –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞: –¥–æ —Å–µ–º–∏ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—Ç —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ –ü–µ—Ä–≤–æ–π –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π –≤–æ–π–Ω—ã –∏ —Å–æ—Ä–µ–≤–Ω—É—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –∑–∞–≤–æ–µ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø—ã. –ï—Å—Ç—å –¥–≤–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ —á–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π ‚Äî –∞—Ä–º–∏–∏ –∏ —Ñ–ª–æ—Ç—ã ‚Äî –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–∏ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π: –¥–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è, —Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥—Ä—É–≥—É—é —á–∞—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏—è (—Ñ–ª–æ—Ç—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å –∞—Ä–º–∏–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö –ø–æ –≤–æ–¥–æ–µ–º–∞–º). –í—ã —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—â–∞–µ—Ç–µ —Å–≤–æ–∏ —Å–∏–ª—ã –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –ø–æ–ª—é –∏ –±–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–µ—Å—å –∑–∞ 34 –æ—Å–æ–±—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ä—Ä–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç—ã, –Ω–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–º–∏ —Å–Ω–∞–±–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.  
2) ¬´–î–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—é¬ª –Ω–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç ¬´–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∞–π—à–∏–º —Å–æ—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –æ–±–º–∞–Ω–∞ –∏ –¥–≤—É–ª–∏—á–∏—è –≤ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤–æ–º –º–∏—Ä–µ¬ª. –ò–∑-–∑–∞ –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –º–µ–∂–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è ¬´–î–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—è¬ª —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –ø–µ—á–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∫ ¬´–∏–≥—Ä–∞, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—É—à–∞—é—â–∞—è –¥—Ä—É–∂–±—É¬ª.
3) –í —ç—Ç–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä–µ –Ω–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª, —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É—é—â–∏—Ö –æ—Ç –∫–æ–≥–æ-–ª–∏–±–æ –±—ã—Ç—å —á–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–º –≤–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ–≤. –ò–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –Ω–∞–≥–ª–æ –ª–≥–∞—Ç—å, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—É—à–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ—é–∑—ã, –∑–∞–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç—å –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∞–∫–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–¥–µ–ª–∫–∏, –º–µ–Ω—è—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã.
–ò–∑ —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —è—Å–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω¬ª —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –∫—É–¥–∞ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–µ, —á–µ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏. 
–¢–∞–∫–∂–µ —è—Å–Ω–æ, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–æ–π–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Å —à–∞—Ö–º–∞—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏ –ì–æ: ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω¬ª –ø–æ–≤—ã—Å–∏—Ç —Å–≤–æ–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –æ—Ç —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞ –¥–æ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —á–µ–º–ø–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –º–∏—Ä–∞ –∏ –≤—ã—à–µ.
–¢–∞–∫ —á—Ç–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—Ç—å - —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∞–≤—ã. ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω¬ª - —ç—Ç–æ —Ä–∞–¥–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤. –≠—Ç–æ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–µ –≤ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ò–ò —Å–≤–∏–¥–µ—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–æ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—É—Ç–µ–º –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –ò–ò, –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞—é—â–µ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω–æ–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä–æ–º —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π. –ü—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ: 
‚Ä¢ —á—Ç–æ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò –ø–æ-—á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Ç—É–ø –∏ –Ω–∏—á–µ–≥–æ –Ω–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –æ –º–∏—Ä–µ;
‚Ä¢ –∏ –Ω–µ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç –¥–∞–∂–µ —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∑–∞—á–∞—Ç–∫–∞–º–∏ —Å–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è.
–°–∞–º–æ–ª–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–∂–µ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω –ª–µ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ –ª–µ—Å—É, –ø–æ—Ä—Ö–∞—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É –≤–µ—Ç–≤–µ–π –∏ —Å–ª–µ—Ç—É –ø—Ä–∏—Å–∞–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Ç–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –±—É–∫–∞—à–∫–æ–π. –ó–∞—Ç–æ –æ–Ω —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—Ç—å —Ç–æ, –∑–∞—á–µ–º –æ–Ω —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω ‚Äì –ø–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ –≤–æ–∑–¥—É—Ö—É –ª—é–¥–µ–π –∏ —Ç—è–∂–µ–ª—ã–µ –≥—Ä—É–∑—ã –Ω–∞ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–µ —Ä–∞—Å—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è.
–ù–æ –æ—Ç–¥–∞–≤–∞—è –¥–∞–Ω—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ä—ã–≤—É, —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º—É ¬´–¶–∏—Ü–µ—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–º¬ª, –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å, —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∏–∫–∞–∫ –Ω–∞—Å –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–±–ª–∏–∂–∞–µ—Ç –∫ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—é AGI.

–ù–∞–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞—é, —á—Ç–æ –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–æ–µ –∑–∞—Å–µ–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–∞ –ù–ö–¶ SETI –∏–º. –õ.–ú. –ì–∏–Ω–¥–∏–ª–∏—Å–∞ (—Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ —Å —Å–µ–∫—Ü–∏–µ–π 7 –ù–°–ê –†–ê–ù "–ñ–∏–∑–Ω—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—É–º –≤–æ –í—Å–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π") —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ –ø—è—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—É, 18 –Ω–æ—è–±—Ä—è,  –≤ 17:00 –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü-–∑–∞–ª–µ –ì–ê–ò–®. –û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä –ø—Ä–æ–π–¥–µ—Ç —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–≥–æ –æ—á–Ω—ã–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–º, —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ª—è—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ zoom –Ω–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç (–Ω–æ –≤–∏–¥–µ–æ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–∞ –≤ —Å–µ—Ç–∏ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è). –¢–µ–º–∞ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–∞:

–ì–æ–ª–æ—â–∞–ø–æ–≤ –í. –ò.

–°–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –ª–∏ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç? –ú–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —ç–≤–æ–ª—é—Ü–∏–∏ –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª–æ, —á—Ç–æ —Ç–æ—Ç –∂–µ –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ, —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–ª –Ω–∞—Å —Ç–∞–∫ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ —É–º–Ω—ã–º–∏, –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –∑–∞—Ö–ª–æ–ø–Ω—É—Ç—å –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –æ–∫–Ω–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞.

–í–æ–ø—Ä–µ–∫–∏ –æ–±—ã–¥–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è–º, –∞–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ø–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏ –∑–∞–º–µ—Ç–∏–ª–∏, —á—Ç–æ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Ç–µ—Ä—è–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä—ã –º–æ–∑–≥–∞ –∏, –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–π –≤–∏–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏, —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞. –ó–∞ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ 25 —Ç—ã—Å—è—á –ª–µ—Ç –º—ã –ø–æ—Ç–µ—Ä—è–ª–∏ —É–∂–µ –æ–∫–æ–ª–æ 8% –æ–±—ä–µ–º–∞ –º–æ–∑–≥–∞, –∏ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—å —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞ –ø–æ–∫–∞ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∞–µ—Ç. –ú–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–π —ç–≤–æ–ª—é—Ü–∏–∏ –∏, –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–µ–µ, "–∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥—Ä–∞–π–≤–∞", –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –ø–æ—è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç —ç–≤–æ–ª—é—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—É—é —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–æ–≥–æ –º–æ–∑–≥–∞, —á—Ç–æ –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å –æ–±–ª–µ–≥—á–∞–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π, –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –ø–æ–±–æ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–æ–π —è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä–∞ –º–æ–∑–≥–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞. –≠—Ç–æ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–º –ø–æ-–Ω–æ–≤–æ–º—É –≤–∑–≥–ª—è–Ω—É—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —ç–≤–æ–ª—é—Ü–∏—é –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑—É–º–∞, –Ω–∞ –µ–≥–æ –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–∏ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, –ø—Ä–∏—á–µ–º –Ω–µ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ª—é–¥–µ–π, –Ω–æ –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –≤–∏–¥–æ–≤; –∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å, —á—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —É –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –≤–∏–¥–æ–≤ —Å –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º –∏ —Å–∞–º–æ—Å–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º. –≠—Ç–æ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–æ–π—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –º—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º —Å–≤–æ–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –ª–∏—à—å –æ–± –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑—É–º–Ω–æ–º –≤–∏–¥–µ, –∏ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å–µ—Ä—å—ë–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥—É–º—å—è—Ö –æ –ø–µ—Ä—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ö –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ –∏–Ω–æ–≥–æ, —á–µ–º —É –Ω–∞—Å, —Ä–∞–∑—É–º–∞.

date : 2022-11-16 03:49:48+00:00
message : –ö–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ ‚Äì –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä—ã –ò–Ω—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—É—Ç–∞ AIRI —Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –±—É–¥—É—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω–æ ü•≥

üóì 16 –Ω–æ—è–±—Ä—è –≤ 17:00 –Ω–∞ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–µ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ AIRI –∏–∑ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã ¬´–ù–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã¬ª –ê—Ä—Ç–µ–º –°–æ—Ä–æ–∫–∏–Ω —Å –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–º ¬´–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –ø–∞–º—è—Ç—å —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –Ω–µ–æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏¬ª. 

–í —ç—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Ç–µ–º–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–π –ø–∞–º—è—Ç–∏, –æ–Ω–∞ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è. –û–Ω–∞ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏–∑ –ø—Ä–æ—à–ª–æ–≥–æ –¥–ª—è –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –∞–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö –∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ-–Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∞—Ö. –ë–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è —ç—Ç–æ–º—É –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—é—Ç –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏—è—Ö, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –æ–Ω–∏ –Ω–µ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞—é—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –æ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–º —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã. –û–¥–Ω–∞–∫–æ, –Ω–µ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è –Ω–∞ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ—á–∏—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ø—ã—Ç–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –ø–∞–º—è—Ç–∏ –≤ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞—Ö –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–¥–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º, —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤—Å—ë –µ—â–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã. 

–°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—ã –∫ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã–º –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—è–º –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–º —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω—ã —Å –≥—Ä–∞–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏. –í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ, –∑–∞ –æ–¥–∏–Ω —à–∞–≥ –≥—Ä–∞–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å—é –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å –ø—Ä–æ–º–µ–∂—É—Ç–æ—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ —à–∞–≥–∞–º–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏. –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–µ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —á–∏—Å—Ç–æ –≥—Ä–∞–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥—ã –¥–ª—è –∏–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ. 
üë®‚Äçüíª –ê—Ä—Ç–µ–º –°–æ—Ä–æ–∫–∏–Ω —Ä–∞—Å—Å–∫–∞–∂–µ—Ç –æ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–µ –∏–∑–±–µ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–π. –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ NeurIPS 2022.

–ü—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞ –Ω–∞–¥–µ–∂–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–µ–º–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–º–µ–µ—Ç —Ä–µ—à–∞—é—â–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ª—é–±–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞, –∏ –æ–Ω–∞ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∏–º–µ—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–∞—é—â–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤, –æ—Å–Ω–∞—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞ (–ò–ò), –ø–æ –º–µ—Ä–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏—Ö. –°—É–¥—è –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É, –æ–Ω–∞ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤—Å–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑-–∑–∞ —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–æ–≤ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–¥–µ—Ä–∂–µ–∫ –≤ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã. –ß—Ç–æ–±—ã —É–¥–æ–≤–ª–µ—Ç–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å —ç—Ç—É –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ–ø—É—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—á–µ–π –¥–µ–º–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏¬ª. –í –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º "–≤–∑–≤–µ—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç–µ–∫—É—á–µ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–∞", –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—â–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ–¥–∞ —è–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –Ω–µ—è–≤–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–º–∏ –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —á–ª–µ–Ω—ã –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –Ω–µ—è–≤–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∫–∏ —á–ª–µ–Ω–æ–≤, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è—Ö –∏—Ö –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤ –æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ. –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ —Å—Ä–∞–≤–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é —Å –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏  –∞–ª—å—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—Ç–∏–≤–∞–º–∏ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–∑ —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π –≤ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∏–º–∏—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-–º–∞—Ä–∫–µ—Ç–ø–ª–µ–π—Å–∞.

—Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–µ–µ –∑–∞—Å–µ–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–∞ ¬´–ö–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–µ–∂–∞—é—â–∏–µ –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤—ã¬ª –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–µ –ù–ò–Ø–£ –ú–ò–§–ò —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ —á–µ—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–≥, 3 –Ω–æ—è–±—Ä—è –≤ 17:30 –ø–æ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–µ. –§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–∞–µ–º—Å—è —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–µ–∂–Ω–∏–π. –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ (–≤—Ä–µ–º—è –º–æ—Å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–æ–µ):

17:30‚Äî –î–∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å–∏—è –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–º—É "–û –ø—É—Ç—è—Ö –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è AGI". –ú–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä: –î. –ñ—É—Ä–∞–≤–ª—ë–≤. –î–∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å–∏—è –Ω–∞—á–Ω–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–∑–æ—Ä–∞ –ª–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∞—Ç—É—Ä—ã –º–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º (–Ω–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 20 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç), –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ —á–µ–≥–æ –≤ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è.

18:00 ‚Äî –î–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ –í–ª–∞–¥–∏–º–∏—Ä–∞ –°–º–æ–ª–∏–Ω–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–º—É ¬´–ù–µ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è: –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è, –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –ª–∏–Ω–µ–∞—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è ‚Äî –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –º–∞—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ–∫–∞—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è)¬ª.

–ê–Ω–Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è:

–ê–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª–∏–ª–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö ¬´–∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö¬ª –∑–∞–¥–∞—á. –ü–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –º–æ—â–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º–æ–π —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –æ–±—ä—ë–º–æ–≤ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —ç–Ω–µ—Ä–≥–æ–ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∑—É—é—â–∏–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –º–æ—â–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤, –∑–∞ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–µ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∏–ª–µ—Ç–∏–µ –≤—ã—Ä–æ—Å–ª–∏ –≤ –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω —Ä–∞–∑. –í —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–µ–µ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∏–ª–µ—Ç–∏–µ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç –µ—â—ë –≤ –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω —Ä–∞–∑ —É–∂–µ –Ω–µ–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω, –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –ø—É—Ç–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è.

–ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ (–ø–æ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫—É –Ω–µ–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ‚Ä¶) –±–µ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ—â–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–µ–π –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—Å—ë –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á. –ú–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä—É —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –º–µ–Ω—å—à–∏–µ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å—ã, –ø–æ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫—É –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç —Å–≤–æ–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è, –∞ —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –Ω–∞ –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—ã—Ö, —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –Ω–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤. –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–µ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–æ—á–µ–Ω—ã –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞—Ö –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π —á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏. –í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –∂–µ –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏ –æ—Å—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤–æ–∑–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –Ω–∞ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞.

–ù–µ–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ü–µ–ª–æ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò (AGI) –ø—Ä–∏–≤–æ–¥—è—Ç –∫ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–¥–µ–∏ –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏, –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –ª–∏–Ω–µ–∞—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–µ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–µ–π. –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—É—Ç–µ–π –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—á–∏—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–¥–µ–π –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –∫–∞—Ä—Ç, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ –∏–µ—Ä–∞—Ä—Ö–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É, –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ–π –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω—ã ‚Äì —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.

–ù–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–æ–≤ –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è–º–∏ –∏–µ—Ä–∞—Ä—Ö–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º—É—é –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–∏ –≤ –¥–≤—É—Ö –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–∞—Ö: –Ω–µ–º–µ–¥–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∏–º–µ—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π (–∏–Ω—Ç—É–∏—Ü–∏—è) –∏ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π (–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ) –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã—Ö –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π.

–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥—á–∏–∫–µ: –°–º–æ–ª–∏–Ω –í–ª–∞–¥–∏–º–∏—Ä –°–µ—Ä–≥–µ–µ–≤–∏—á, –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ —Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –≤ –§–ò–¶ –ò–ü–ú –∏–º. –ú.–í. –ö–µ–ª–¥—ã—à–∞ –†–ê–ù. –í –ò–ü–ú —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é —Å 1999 –≥., –æ–∫–æ–Ω—á–∏–ª –ú–§–¢–ò –≤ 1980 –≥, –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –ò–ò –∏ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ç–µ–π –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—Å—è –µ—â—ë –≤ 1976 –≥. –° 1980 –ø–æ 1998 –≥. —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª –≤ –ª–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ–±–∏–æ–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –≤ –ú–ò–†–≠–ê.

–î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏: –°–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä –ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω (–≤ –ó—É–º–µ). –°—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –ó—É–º –ø—Ä–µ–∂–Ω—è—è –∏ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∞ –µ—â–µ —Ä–∞–∑ –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–º. –°–∞–π—Ç https://seminar.bicalab.org –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω –≤ –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–µ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è.
